formalText: They didn't think they would make it through the weekend.
They called their husband and they are going the ER until she feels better.
They feel like they have some creep disease but like it doesn't look like it and that's something like every 5 or 10 minutes after they started decide not to kill themself that takes a lot of work.
They feel that at least two other people who think they are awesome.
But they  don't think it matters.
They feel like a lot of things are failures in their life.
The clinician thinks James should come and they should go to the ER until they start to feel better
